title: Mandala
provenance_text:
Pablo Palazuelo [1916-2007], Paris, France; Aimé Maeght, Paris, France, until January 1959 [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 338, illustrated in catalogue, plate 26) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by Aimé Maeght, Paris, France. See also note [2] below.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on November 21, 1958. Payment was sent to Aimé Maeght (via the Institute's French agent) on January 9, 1959.
